message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a good deal, but I'm not going for 50/50!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give away too much!
You're getting desperate, I can see that. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up all the power!
I'm getting closer to giving in, but I'm not ready to surrender just yet!
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm not going to get a better deal than this!
